meta.description: "O give thanks unto the Lord; call upon his name: make known his deeds among the people" (Ps. 105:1). It is with heartfelt gratitude for the many blessings and healings I have had in Christian Science that I give this testimony. While living in a foreign country, I became interested in Christian Science at the time of the passing on of a much-loved younger brother. Turning to Science in my need of comfort, I was healed of grief. Shortly before this I had witnessed the healing of my mother of poisoning resulting from vaccination. She had turned to Christian Science for help and through the work of a consecrated practitioner was healed in a short time.

title: "O give thanks unto the Lord;... / Christian Science Sentinel
cleaned_text:
"O give thanks unto the Lord; call upon his name: make known his deeds among the people" (Ps. 105:1). It is with heartfelt gratitude for the many blessings and healings I have had in Christian Science that I give this testimony.

While living in a foreign country, I became interested in Christian Science at the time of the passing on of a much-loved younger brother. Turning to Science in my need of comfort, I was healed of grief. Shortly before this I had witnessed the healing of my mother of poisoning resulting from vaccination. She had turned to Christian Science for help and through the work of a consecrated practitioner was healed in a short time.
